result.purpose: This folder contains scripts related to the Swagger UI library for generating and displaying interactive API documentation.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each script serves a specific purpose related to the Swagger UI functionality, allowing for easy integration and maintenance.

_api_specs/scripts/swagger-initializer.j.purpose: Initializes Swagger UI for API documentation display
side_effects: Modifies the DOM to display Swagger UI
risks: Potential exposure of API documentation if not secured

_api_specs/scripts/swagger-ui-bundle.js.purpose: This file is part of the Swagger UI library, which is used to generate interactive API documentation.
side_effects: Defines a module for use in CommonJS or as a global variable.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive API documentation if not properly secured.

_api_specs/scripts/swagger-ui-es-bundle-.purpose: This file is part of the Swagger UI library, which is used to display API documentation and facilitate interaction with APIs.
side_effects: Modifies the DOM for rendering API documentation
Potentially modifies global state through Redux
risks: XSS vulnerabilities if user input is not properly sanitized
Potential performance issues due to heavy use of lodash functions

_api_specs/scripts/swagger-ui-es-bundle..purpose: This file is part of the Swagger UI library, which provides a user interface for API documentation.
side_effects: Modifies the DOM to display API documentation
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive API information if not properly secured

_api_specs/scripts/swagger-ui-standalone.purpose: This file is part of the Swagger UI library, providing a standalone preset for displaying API documentation.
side_effects: Defines a module that can be imported in other JavaScript files.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if the module is improperly configured.

_api_specs/scripts/swagger-ui.js.purpose: This file is part of the Swagger UI library, which is used to generate interactive API documentation.
side_effects: Exports the Swagger UI functionality for use in other modules.
